Have you taken time to imagine a world without youth, that means there will be a world without a future because youths are the future. If there is a nation without youth, then there is a nation without a vision, a nation without a drive. Youths are the evidence of a productive past and a prosperous future. A nation without youth will be less active, vibrant and it will be dull.

## Who are youths?
